thread.title: Local News: KTN's Betty Kyallo and Dennis Okari's wedding trends on social media
thread.title_full: Local News: KTN's Betty Kyallo and Dennis Okari's wedding trends on social media

title: Local News: KTN's Betty Kyallo and Dennis Okari's wedding trends on social media
text:
By James Wanzala Friday, Oct 2nd 2015 at 14:23 
By James Wanzala 
News that KTN TV anchor and lovely, beautiful and jovial Betty Kyalo wed NTV’s Investigative reporter Dennis Okari caused social media abuzz with hashtag #BettyWedsDennis trending on Twitter. 
Kenyans of all walks of life joined in congratulating the two for their wedding. Betty Kyalo is well known and loved for her Friday news show Friday Briefing where she hosts celebrities from different fields as guest anchors. 
Many congratulatory messages came in from her fellow media personalities, her viewers, social media funs and Kenyans at large. 
‏ @WachiraLynne : @KTNKenya representing at #BettyWedsDennis @MKapombe @YvonneOkwara. 
‏ @LarryMadowo : Here comes the bride! #BettyWedsDennis @BettyKyalo @DennisOkari 
‏ @eriknjoka : Proud of these two. #BettyWedsDennis @BettyKyalo @DennisOkari Beautiful Wedding this is. Glad to be part of it. 
‏@SwakaTheBrand : Congrats @BettyKyalo and @DennisOkari on your wedding. Wishing you God's blessings in your marriage. #BettyWedsDennis. 
The couples were seen posing with expensive and classic cars from RMA Motors which also raised eyebrows. 
‏ @corriemwende : He he so corporate organizations leveraging on this trend #BettyWedsDennis so as to gain publicity...nice! But RMA motors wins!! GO TO PAGE 1 2 Next » SIMILAR STORIES 10 hours ago
